<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs=""
>
[Immortal Bear](/Feats.aspx?ID=4095) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 184 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Ursine Avenger Hood](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=200)

**Prerequisites**
[Ursine Avenger Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4086)

</column>

---

Your body thrums with the primal vitality of the greatest of the ursine beasts. When in Ursine Avenger Form, you gain [fast healing 5](/Rules.aspx?ID=796).
name: Immortal Bear
